report.title: Get my squares and plots
report.description: Get a list of Core Squares and Additional Squares that have been assigned to the user and list them with their associated plots. Only plots without samples are editable.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples locationSamples on locationSamples.location_id = l.id LEFT JOIN termlists_terms ttPlotType on ttPlotType.id = l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN terms termPlotType on termPlotType.id = ttPlotType.term_id JOIN locations square on (square.id=l.id OR square.id=l.parent_id) AND square.location_type_id=#core_square_location_type_id# OR square.location_type_id=#additional_square_location_type_id# LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=square.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# JOIN users u on u.id=#current_user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=square.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.deleted=false WHERE (l.id = square.id OR l.parent_id = square.id) AND #website_filter# AND l.deleted=false

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.

column.name: show_square_add_plot_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null then true else false end

column.name: show_square_edit_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null AND l.created_by_id=#current_user_id# then true else false end

column.name: show_plot_view_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is not null then true else false end

column.name: show_plot_edit_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is not null AND count(locationSamples.id) = 0 then true else false end

column.name: name
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null then '' || square.centroid_sref || ' - ' || coalesce(lav.text_value,'#no_vice_county_found_message#') || '' else '' || 'Plot at ' || l.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end
